item.description:
Dancing lights, hot new music, glow-in-the-dark lanes, pins and balls. It’s light years beyond ordinary. 9:00 PM - Midnight.

You can pay as you go- $3.99 a game plus 3.00 shoe rental OR Get a Group rate with 5 people- $60.00 all games you can play, shoes and a pitcher of coke.

For those interested, we will begin the night at Tata's, Caribbean Cuisine, located at 104 Quinnipiac Street, Wallingford. We will begin there at 6:45, and then move to Bowling! When you RSVP, please be sure to anser the question: Will you be doing dinner?
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Terri and the Gang... Cell is 203-808-5829

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Dinner at Tata's and Cosmic Bowling in Wallingford, CT
